annotation_sentence: Good morning! Uh, my morning... um, it start early.
rationale: The phrase 'Good morning!' is a speech act as it is a greeting.
The phrase 'Yes, yes!' is a speech act as it is an affirmation.

annotation_sentence: Thank you! I try to keep it, um, same every day.
rationale: The phrase 'Thank you!' is a speech act as it is an expression of gratitude.
